knowhow.title: Knowledge-sharing social media platform
knowhow.description:
Fully functional social media platform built using T3 Stack (React.js, Next.js, tRPC, NextAuth.js and Prisma). The database component was created using MySQL and hosted on PlanetScale. The UI was created with MantineUI. The platform is split into two main parts - the user application and administative panel.

The user application allows anyone to view post created by others using different content exploration methods - main page (with recent posts), trending page, topic page and search page. User can also create an account and customize it by changing the profile description, setting profile picture and more. This website was created with Responsive web design approach, which ensures that the platform is displayed properly across all screen sizes.

The admin panel allows the administrator to manage the content on the platform. Only user with specific permissions can access it, and such an account can perform a wide variety of different actions. For example, administrator can view user reports and decide, wether reported content is against platform’s terms of service. Additionally, the administrator can manage users, apply penalties, or fully remove them from the platform.

digit-recognition.title: Digit recognition
digit-recognition.description:
Digit recognition system trained using MNIST database. The machine learning was built with TensorFlow 2.0 and Keras libraries and it uses Convolutional Neural Network. The model has achieved an accuracy of 98.84%.

Additionally, the model has been attached to simple Flask backend, which in combination with interactive React.js canvas allows anyone to test out the model with their own writing.

personal-website.title: This personal website
personal-website.description: This personal website was created as a portfolio to showcase my works. The backbone of this project is Next.js, which offers many useful features, such as Search Engine Optimization and Server Side Rendering. This website was styled using SCSS modules and the animations were implemented with Framer Motion. Additionally, this project utilizes Next-intl library, which enabled me to implement internationalization of the website.

racetrack-ranking.title: Racetrack ranking platform
racetrack-ranking.description: Web platform for browsing and reviewing different racetracks around the world. Backend was implemented with Express.js, and the data was persisted in MongoDB database. The user inteface was implemented in HTML and CSS with the EJS templating language. This website was created with Responsive web design approach, which ensures that the platform is displayed properly across all screen sizes.

weather-app.title: Weather app
weather-app.description: Weather web app implemented in React.js inspired by iOS weather application. It utilizes Axios library to fetch data from Visual Crossing weather data API. The colors for daily temperature bars were implementing by manipulating the hue of HSL color model.

commutely.title: Commutely
commutely.description: Web calculator created with Bootstrap, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. It helps to inform people on the emissions that they produce while commuting to shool or work. Additionaly, it provides an estimate on how much money can be saved daily by using public transport.
